extension.name: Content - Simple Pop-Up
extension.author: Anders Wasén
extension.copyright: Copyright 2011 (C) Anders Wasén. All rights reserved.
extension.description: Simple Pop-Up - It will display a FancyBox Pop-Up on any page where added in an article...

field.name: spu_aligntext
field.label: Align text
field.description: Text alignment in the Pop-Up box.

field.name: spu_boxheight
field.label: Pop-up box height (in pixels)
field.description: Pop-up box height (in pixels). Set it to [auto] to grow as needed on height.

field.name: spu_autodimensions
field.label: Auto Dimensions
field.description: The Pop-Up box will shape according to content.

field.name: spu_cookie
field.label: Use cookie (to only show once)
field.description: Shows the message only once at pop-up on load. Default cookie persistence is 365 days.

field.name: spu_cookiepersistence
field.label: Cookie persistence (in days)
field.description: The number of days to passbefore message is shown again to the same user (=computer).

field.name: spu_style
field.label: Box style
field.description: Use FancyBox or LightBox styled Pop-Up boxes.

field.label: I've spent a lot (did I say A LOT) of time developing this. Please send me a dollar or two, or why not five?
field.description: Feel like showing your appreciation? Build: 2.0

field.name: spu_jqueryinclude
field.label: Load jQuery through Joomla
field.description: This will load jQuery through Joomla or nativly (hard).

field.name: spu_jquery
field.label: Prevent jQuery 1.4.3 loading
field.description: This will exclude jQuery from loading in Simple File Upload. There are other extensions/templates that can cause conflicts, use this to eliminate any jQuery conflicts.

field.name: upload_jqueryver
field.label: jQuery version
field.description: Some extensions are loading older versions of jQuery. SFL can support older versions using deprecated functions for jQuery versions below 1.7.1.
